com.jcabi.simpledb

Interface Credentials

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    Credentials.Assumed, Credentials.Direct, Credentials.Simple

    @Immutable
public interface Credentials
    Amazon SimpleDB credentials.

    It is recommended to use Credentials.Simple in most cases.

    Since:
    0.1
    Version:
    $Id$
    Author:
    Yegor Bugayenko (yegor@tpc2.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  Credentials.Assumed
      Assumed AWS IAM role.
      static class  Credentials.Direct
      With explicitly specified endpoint.
      static class  Credentials.Simple
      Simple implementation.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Credentials TEST
      Test credentials, for unit testing mostly.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      com.amazonaws.services.simpledb.AmazonSimpleDB aws()
      Build AWS client.

    • Field Detail

      • TEST

        static final Credentials TEST
        Test credentials, for unit testing mostly.

    • Method Detail

      • aws

        @NotNull
com.amazonaws.services.simpledb.AmazonSimpleDB aws()
        Build AWS client.

        Don't forget to shut it down after use, using AmazonSimpleDB#shutdown().

        Returns:
        Amazon Dynamo DB client
